website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, portable dartboard can run on batteries or an adapter, so it's great for games on the go.
pros: Concave segment holes helps prevent darts from bouncing out
Measures 22.75" high x 20.5" wide x 1.125" deep

customer_reviews.title: nice dart board.
customer_reviews.text: dart board is nice and functions very well.have used it a lot.darts that come with board are just the correct weight for it and darts stick well to it.the 16 gram and up are way to heavy.try to get 10-12 gram darts they stick great. I had hoped to find the same darts that came with board but couldn't find them.i got a few different sets and the MAXMAU 18 pcs soft tip darts 10g slim for electronic dart boards worked best for us...it was well worth the money for this dart board.
customer_reviews.author: mark c.

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this board was based on the good reviews. After hanging the board up, we decided to try it out. I am not happy at all with what I received for the price. The sound is so low you need a hearing aid to hear it. The darts don't stick. The plastic is very flimsy. Not to mention, the scoring is off. All in all, this is a very bad investment. I will be returning this a.s.a.p.!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B

customer_reviews.title: Dart Player
customer_reviews.text: I have had this a couple of weeks .Not sure about the scoring. One thing for sure, it is not quiet. I would say this thing is loud. Our dart's stick ok. We get some bounce outs It scores correctly most of the time. I will follow up with another review
customer_reviews.author: JERRY C

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for electronic soft dart board
customer_reviews.text: Good regulation size soft dart board. Easy to read display with sound effects. Be careful that most electronic dart boards in this price range are bar size (smaller). You can’t tell that from pictures. Check the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, played darts about 10 times, and then 1 day the display stopped working and its past 30days so i cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality good, scoring accurate
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are having a blast with this. Quality good, scoring accurate, our 16g darts stick well and easy to remove. Really surprised at the quality vs similar boards around the price. Good value and looks nice on the wall. Easy install ! Have fun
customer_reviews.author: William Dymond

customer_reviews.title: Not the most accurate, reasonable price, if its just for you and a few friends to play its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for a gameroom. Accuracy is so so, but if you just want a simple dartboard this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Dinnsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids & adults!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as birthday gift for an 11-yr-old boy. It was the hit of the party! Both kids and adults played together for hours. Easy enough for young kids to play. Fun enough for the more skilled, competitive players. I recommend buying extra darts, especially if you have more than a few players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of games, and easy to install. It would of been nice if tape measure with marks would have been included, but sadly it was not.
customer_reviews.author: GemNEye

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Got This One
customer_reviews.text: Durable and fun, I like the colors, not that black and red only or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: mark storey

customer_reviews.title: He seemed to really like it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday present for my preteen grandson. He seemed to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: RLP

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it. It was worth every penny we spent ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. It was worth every penny we spent on this gift.
customer_reviews.author: ruth Coston

customer_reviews.title: Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11 year old grandson. He loves it! Electronic scoring keeps everyone honest - and saves me from subtraction errors. Recommend buying additional darts as those provided are kind of "basic" in quality. Even the adults like paying it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Many outs of fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: The coolest dart board ever. It keeps score. Many outs of fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ant

customer_reviews.title: Price was right and so far so good as I am using a heavy dart I dont ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and so far so good as I am using a heavy dart I dont think there is a better board for the 65$ price
customer_reviews.author: Nate M

customer_reviews.title: Bad return policy
customer_reviews.text: The dartboard itself is fine but it can only be returned for a month. We bought this item as a Christmas gift but in the meantime they received one from someone else. Now we are stuck with it because it can't be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Long time subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought this dartboard for us to play darts on. It has thing quality plastic which feels very flimsy and I can barely hear the sound. I think she's going to end up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: David Harding

product_meta.title: Hathaway Magnum Electronic Soft Tip Dartboard
product_meta.description: The Hathaway Magnum is a lightweight version of dart fun, weighing in at less than 7-lbs. This product is easy to carry from place to place and can be powered by either electricity or batteries. All you need is a spot to hang the board and your fun begins. With a host of game options, this electronic scoring dartboard will accommodate up to 8 players. Comes with 2 sets of soft tip darts. 180-Day limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Dimensions 22.75-In H x 20.5-In w x 1.125-In D
Lightweight and portable dartboard; concave segment holes for fewer bounce-outs
Electronic scoring with push button control panel LED display
Powered by electricity or batteries ((4) AA batteries not included)
Accommodates up to 8 players with 90 options; 20 game capacity with bounce out button
